participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, enjoys expressing herself through dance and appreciates the charm of past eras.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, deeply values spirituality and self-reflection.
participant_2.background: i'm a buddhist. i live in alaska. i've not spoken in three months. i like meditation. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.
